content: 1 5 1 5 1 5 switch to larger sleeve sts on hold needles and proceed to neckline increase round ribbing last method an alternative method is to pick up and knit a body ribbed neckline after completing the remainder of the sweater this creates more structure from which the sweater can hang this is most useful for larger sizes and heavier yarn weights working the ribbing last also makes it easier to adjust the neckline stitch count gauge and bind-off gauge for a perfect fit after casting on switch to larger needles knit a single round then proceed to neckline increase round neckline increase round knit increasing 6 4 8 12 16 24 20 22 28 28 36 40 40 44 48 60 64 68 84 sts evenly spaced 84 88 96 108 116 128 124 132 140 144 152 160 160 164 168 184 192 204 220 sts flax sweater sock/sport facebook-square instagram ravelry pinterest envelope www tincanknits com 4 of knitting direction markers back sleeve sleeve ribbed collar collar front back front eveels thgir tfel eveels yoke garter panel increase lines at raglan markers separation of sleeves and sleeve sts body on hold sts cast on body sts at underarms on needle sleeves garter panel d o ir f e k c n ti i o tt n in g yoke round 5 knit to raglan marker sm kfb knit to 2 sts before raglan marker kfb k1 sm twice 4 sts marker set-up k2 p10 10 10 12 12 14 14 16 increase - 2 sts at each front and back 16 16 16 18 18 20 20 20 22 22 22 k2 pm round 6 knit to garter panel purl garter panel k28 30 34 38 42 46 44 46 50 52 56 58 58 58 knit to raglan marker sm kfb knit to 2 sts before 60 68 70 76 84 pm twice raglan marker kfb k1 sm twice 4 sts increase - 2 sts the 4 raglan markers separate the right sleeve at each front and back front left sleeve and back sections work rounds 5-6 a total of 2 2 2 4 5 5 times the central 10 10 10 12 12 14 14 16 16 16 this is 4 4 4 8 10 10 rounds 16 18 18 20 20 20 22 22 22 sts purled in the 412 448 496 528 564 596 total sts sleeve sections are the garter panels - they are worked in garter st from this point to the cuff 82 90 98 102 106 110 sts at each sleeve to work garter st in the round knit 1 round then 124 134 150 162 176 188 sts at each front and purl the next back note you may place markers of a different colour check yoke depth or type from the raglan markers either side of the garter panels to help keep you on track work in pattern no further increases continuing round 1 kfb
